meanings.definition: Capable of being repeatedly softened by heating and hardened by cooling.
meanings.sent1: The thermoplastic toy could be reshaped easily after being warmed up.
meanings.sent2: The thermoplastic container became flexible when exposed to heat.
meanings.sent3: The thermoplastic ruler decided to take a break and relax in the sun to become more malleable.
meanings.sent4: Her ideas were as adaptable as thermoplastic, changing shape with each new challenge.
meanings.sent5: The thermoplastic material was like a chameleon, transforming under different temperatures.

meanings.definition: A material that becomes pliable when heated and hardens when cooled.
meanings.sent1: The thermoplastic used in the project softened in the oven before being molded.
meanings.sent2: Manufacturers prefer using thermoplastics for their versatility in production.
meanings.sent3: The thermoplastic sheet giggled as it turned soft under the heat lamp.
meanings.sent4: His resolve was as strong as thermoplastic, hardening in the face of adversity.
meanings.sent5: The thermoplastic sculpture transformed from a soft blob into a solid masterpiece.
